issue.title: [C++] Install GCS testbench for CI builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14236](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14236). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To continue work on ARROW-1231 I will need to write integration tests for the GCS FileSystem against the GCS testbench. That requires creating a script to install the testbench, and I should write at least one test that uses it.
